question:
You have recently shifted in a rental apartment with your family. However, there are some problems with the apartment.
Write a letter to the landlord. In your letter.
 Describe the problem
 Demand the solution for the
problem
 Inform him what you will do if the
problem is not solved.
text: I am writing this letter to you regarding the problems with the apartment . I just have tenant this apartment before few days.

I recently shifted your place with my family , but we are getting few problems about kitchen tab which is lacking and the window glass is broken because I have a little baby , she is  five years old she often go there to see outside view.
I think you need to call  both mechanics who can replace the water  tab as well as you need to change the window door which is a big issue for me .

last two days before I already inform you about this but I haven't taken action  if you are never taking serious  action thence  I am unable to stay here more. As per our contract,  I paid you three months' rental in advance.so if the issues are not solved so  I will cancel my contract with you.
I look forward to hearing from you soon and you will take action as soon as possible.
